description: This module implements a Car simulator that can execute charging sessions using the yeti-simulation-control interface

connector_id.description: Connector id of the evse manager to which this simulator is connected to

auto_enable.description: Enable this simulation directly at start. Set to true for pure SIL configs, set to false for HIL.

auto_exec.description: Enable automatic execution of simulation commands at startup from auto_exec_commands config option.
